Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory244.png'}
{3: 'On the bridge, Chi Ling headshots a Musashi VI opposite of them, then charges forward with two Pulao soldiers to cover Qu and then retreat behind the defensive line.'}
{3: 'When the three approach, Qu grabs a rifle from a Pulao soldier and empties the clip under the bridge.'}
{3: 'Once the gunfire stops, the roar from the Corrupted falls silent.'}
{3: 'Qu hands the rifle back to the soldier who is left speechless.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "Blowing up the bridge will delay the Corrupted, but we can't drop our guard yet.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Regroup and check each team for damages.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After giving the order, Qu takes the soldiers back to the human frontline below the city wall. The defensive turrets destroy hordes of Corrupted with each volley.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao Crew A', 3: "The Corrupted can't even get close thanks to all the suppressive fire from Baxia's turrets...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Suddenly, the blast from a cannon crosses the broken bridge and crashes into the frontline. The soldier is thrown to the ground mid-sentence...'}
{3: 'The blast can be seen coming from a Musashi VI that has stopped working, despite still being in a firing position with only its upper body left.'}
{3: 'Laying on the ground, the shell-shocked soldier opens his mouth in surprise to see that he is still alive despite being near the impact point.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "A mouthful of warm blood falls on the soldier's cheek. He looks up to see that Chi Ling had protected him just now."}
{3: "However, Chi Ling's left arm is badly burned by the explosion. Blood spills down the corner of his mouth, dripping on the soldier beneath him."}
{3: 'Watching from behind, Qu rushes over.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Medic! Chi Ling needs medical attention.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Chi Ling raises his right hand to wipe the blood from the corner of his mouth and waves at Qu to stop her from calling a medic.'}
{3: 'The soldier on the ground quickly gets up and trembles to help Chi Ling lean up against a barrier for cover.'}
{2: 'Chi Ling', 3: 'Thanks.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Chi Ling leans back and pats the soldier on the shoulder.'}
{2: 'Chi Ling', 3: "Don't lower your guard on the battlefield. Go, I'm not dying so easily yet.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After the young soldier returns to the defensive line, Chi Ling looks back at Qu.'}
{2: 'Chi Ling', 3: "It's okay. Just a flesh wound. I don't want to retreat from the frontline like this.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Chi Ling takes out his tactical knife from his belt and begins to quickly cut off the charred portion of his left arm.'}
{3: 'Chi Ling quickly takes a deep breath, then expertly wraps the neatly cut portion on his arm in gauze.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Chi Ling', 3: "Don't worry, Lady Qu. It'd just get in the way.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "You haven't changed a bit.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chi Ling', 3: 'Hehe, returning to formation.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Seeing Chi Ling's expression, Qu knew in her heart that she could never persuade him to retreat."}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Alright, let's get going.", 4: '1'}
